pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Gotten by $(l)Crouch + Right Click (In Air)$() with a $(l:pedestals:tools/toolswapper)Tool Swapper$()

pages.title: Uses
pages.text: $(li)Used to craft the $(l:pedestals:filters/filterbase)Base Filter$() crafting component item.

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Right Click$() a pedestal with a filter in it to get details about the inserted filter. $(li)When in the $(l)OFFHAND, LEFT CLICK$() a pedestal to remove its inserted filter. $(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() in the air to swap this into the $(l:pedestals:tools/tagtool)Tag Tool$()
